Title: Distinct Values Queries
Description: You are given an array of n integers and q queries of the form: how many distinct values are there in a range [a,b]?
Input Specification:
The first input line has two integers n and q: the array size and number of queries. 
 The next line has n integers x_1,x_2,\dots,x_n: the array values. 
 Finally, there are q lines describing the queries. Each line has two integers a and b.
Output Specification: For each query, print the number of distinct values in the range.
